ComicInfo.Summary: 1980s one-hit wonder turned witch Valerie Hayes will NOT stop until she has magically stolen our hero William Garland's immense fame and made it her own. Her first attempt failed miserably, so now she's calling on the other members of the one-hit wonder club to help. Full of homages to some of rock's greatest fizzles, this is one issue not to miss!
